pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## unimetarealtime database sync tools## Installationunimeta is distributed on `PyPI <https://pypi.org>`_ as a universalwheel and is available on Linux/macOS and Windows and supportsPython 2.7/3.5+ and PyPy.```shell$ pip install unimeta``````pycon>>> from unimeta.pipeline import Pipeline>>> mysql = "mysql://root:111111@127.0.0.1:3306/hr">>> clickhouse = "clickhouse://127.0.0.1:9000/hr">>> meta = "unimetad://kula@127.0.0.1:8000/mysql2ch">>> pipe = Pipeline(source, sink, meta)>>> pipe.sync()```## Licenseunimeta is distributed under the terms of both- `MIT License <https://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_- `Apache License, Version 2.0 <https://choosealicense.com/licenses/apache-2.0>`_at your option.
